import React, { useState } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; const AddUser = () => { const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [gender, setGender] = useState(""); return (
setName(e.target.value)} type="text" placeholder="Name" />
setEmail(e.target.value)} type="email" placeholder="Email" />
); } export default AddUser;
